meanings.definition: The quality or state of being tall.
meanings.sent1: Her tallness made her stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent2: The giraffe's tallness allowed it to reach the leaves on the tree.
meanings.sent3: The tallness of the building made it impossible to miss.
meanings.sent4: His tallness towered over the other players on the basketball court.
meanings.sent5: The tallness of the mountain was breathtaking as we approached it.

meanings.definition: The height of something or someone.
meanings.sent1: The tallness of the tree provided shade on hot days.
meanings.sent2: She measured the tallness of the door to see if the new furniture would fit through.
meanings.sent3: The tallness of the cake made it a challenge to transport to the party.
meanings.sent4: The tallness of the waves crashing against the shore was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: The tallness of the skyscraper made it a landmark in the city skyline.
